title: Premium chest in hextec wont open
body: i just created a new account, im level 12 i opened my first chest, but the second one has no open button, do i need 3 keys to open the premium chest?

replies.body:
Each hextech chest requires a hextech key to open. If you don't have a key in your inventory, you won't be able to open the chest until you receive one. 

Our [FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) has complete details on crafting. Let me know if you have any questions.

well since its a FREE hextech chest, i do have a key for it. there is just the error which shows me that there "is a problem with this hextech unit" .. and the support doesnt anser my ticket since 2 days
Me and a friend are also having this issue, we are EUW
